a.h1: Fairbanks Local School District Home of the Panthers

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: Good morning! Please check out our video update for Monday, April 27. We will send electronic communication this afternoon. Have a great day!! #ForFairbanks https://youtu.be/Nx2EPflXkJU

Good morning! Please check out our newest blog, "Dear Fairbanks" written by Gage Garlinghouse. Gage is a current senior at Fairbanks. Please take ten minutes to read it. #ForFairbanks https://forfairbanks.wordpress.com/2020/04/27/dear-fairbanks-a-letter-from-gage-garlinghouse/

Good morning! Please check out our video update. In both the video and electronic updates, there is information regarding our final phase of the school year. Please let us know if you have questions. #ForFairbanks https://youtu.be/Wn1Dj8ohbhY
Good morning! Our students are funny, creative, and talented. Check out "Let Me Out" by the Wilson Family. Hope it brings a smile to start your day! #ForFairbanks https://youtu.be/wMYk3F822n0

Good evening! Please watch the brief video regarding Governor DeWine's announcement from today. We will continue to work collaboratively with our staff and parents to navigate our physical closure. #ForFairbanks https://youtu.be/W8KqZ9nVk2A

div.p: Our Community Coffee Chats have been a wonderful way to keep the community and school connected. They've helped to bridge communication to those outside the school, and give our new superintendent...
We are now accepting applications for 2020-2021 Open Enrollment. Start your application here. This link will be active until 4:00pm on Friday, May 1, 2020. An application will need to be filled...
Dear Fairbanks Families, Tomorrow is our first Remote Learning day. We are excited to start this journey with our students. While it is not how we intended to deliver instruction, we will continue...
